Description: Painted limestone shabti of Pamerihu; eight rows of Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Published: Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt (Japan 1999-2000): No 105.
Other objects from this owner include: EA 5513 and EA 35029. See M.L. Bierbrier, 'Pamerihu Finds a Home', GM 179 (2000), 7-8 [number misquoted as 35209]. His tomb was apparently at Saqqara.
